title: Seaside Saudi Arabia Luxury in Central Jazan with Outdoor Pool & Three Restaurants
description:
Discover the charm of Saudi Arabiaâ€™s coastal jewel with a stay at this luxurious five-star retreat. Perfectly positioned in the heart of Jazan, this hotel offers easy access to local attractions including the historic Adosareyah Castle and Al Rashid Mall for a premier shopping experience.

Savour a culinary journey at the hotel's onsite restaurants - delight in hearty Italian dishes at Opera Restaurant or indulge in fresh seafood at Fish Counter, paired with stunning ocean views. Unwind in the sparkling outdoor pool or retreat to your spacious, modern room. For a touch of adventure, head to nearby Jizan Port and embark on a journey to the sun-soaked Farasan Islands.
offer_address: King Fahd Bin Abdul Aziz Road, South Corniche, Gizan City, Jazan 45142, Saudi Arabia
